report.summary: Design / authentication error with PIN usage in Simplenote Android application
report.label: None yet
report.description: Hi team I noticed a design and authentication error (a wrong credential request) in the use of the Simplenote Android application lock PIN POC 1 access the android app of Simplenote > enable lock PIN 2 in the same 'settings' area click 'Exit' You are prompted for a new login. Right 3 minimize the application 4 access the application again The access PIN is requested even after the user exits the account. That seems wrong to me. When the user exits the PIN should be automatically deactivated. In this scenario even leaving the account the user has to enter the PIN. If you have forgotten this credential you will be forced to remove and reinstall the application. This causes some inconvenience in relation to the use of the app. Please check it.
